services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end web applications with intuitive frontend design and empathetic user interfaces tailored to enhance user experience. Our expertise spans React, TypeScript, Node.js and more, allowing us to craft performant and scalable solutions.

services.title: AI & LLM Integration
services.description: AI-powered applications with robust full-stack implementations, leveraging advanced language models for smarter user interactions and functionality. We bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI research and practical business applications.

services.title: Machine Learning
services.description: Building, deploying, and scaling ML models tailored for various business needs, including predictive analytics and automation. We handle the complete ML lifecycle from data preparation to production deployment.

services.title: APIs & Integrations
services.description: Designing and implementing efficient, reliable APIs for seamless system communication and third-party integrations. Our API solutions are built with performance, security, and developer experience in mind.

services.title: Data Flow Services
services.description: Developing scalable, high-performance data pipelines and streaming solutions for efficient data management and real-time analytics. We help you turn raw data into actionable business intelligence.

services.title: OCR & Computer Vision
services.description: Proficient in optical character recognition (OCR) and computer vision technologies for enhanced image and text processing applications. These solutions automate document processing and enable new visual intelligence capabilities.

services.title: Cloud Architecture
services.description: Designing and implementing scalable cloud solutions tailored to your business needs. We leverage the best of AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud to create reliable and cost-effective infrastructures.

services.title: Security Engineering
services.description: Implementing robust security measures throughout the software development lifecycle. Our security-first approach ensures your applications and data remain protected against evolving threats.

services.title: Technical Consulting
services.description: Strategic technical guidance to help businesses make informed decisions about technology investments and implementations. We provide expert advice based on years of industry experience.

featuredProjects.title: Pebbles Capstone Project
featuredProjects.description: An innovative educational platform built for interactive learning and collaborative research.

featuredProjects.title: Celiac App
featuredProjects.description: Innovative application designed to support users with gluten intolerance by integrating advanced OCR and data management for real-time ingredient verification and dietary management.

featuredProjects.title: FinSimpl
featuredProjects.description: Financial platform connecting contractors and clients with tailored financing options through ML-powered matching algorithms.

featuredProjects.title: Budlight Canada
featuredProjects.description: Comprehensive redevelopment of the Bud Light Canada website with modern web technologies and responsive design.

clientProjects.title: Bing Amenities Enhancement
clientProjects.description: Improved coverage for +6 million new businesses with a 55% feature coverage improvement. Enhanced quality by 30% using LLMs and reduced user-reported bugs by 80%.

clientProjects.title: Bing Content Extraction Pipeline
clientProjects.description: Engineered automated pipeline for discovering new domains for Bing, onboarding +500 new providers and enriching data for +2.7B businesses.

clientProjects.title: Personalized Recommender System
clientProjects.description: Delivered a pioneering hyper-personalized recommender system, live since 2020, managing the full lifecycle from dataset creation to deployment and UI integration.

clientProjects.title: Identity Services Data Migration
clientProjects.description: Migrated millions of customer data to Universal Identity Store while ensuring synchronization between data stores, implementing highly scalable distributed systems.

clientProjects.title: Advertising Transaction Pipeline
clientProjects.description: Led the rapid three-week rebuild of Meta's advertising transaction pipeline, managing approximately $2-3 billion in monthly transactions and ensuring regulatory compliance.

clientProjects.title: Trading Pipeline Optimization
clientProjects.description: Engineered numerous cost-effective, high-throughput pipelines reliably handling 100,000+ daily trades with improved efficiency and reliability.

teamMembers.name: Sam Weninger
teamMembers.bio: Sam is an experienced engineer with expertise in backend systems, big data processing, and AI integration. Previously at Microsoft, Huawei, and Holland Bloorview, Sam has worked on production-scale data pipelines handling petabytes of data for Bing.
achievements: Enhanced Bing Amenities quality by +30% leveraging LLMs, benefiting +14M businesses
Implemented language backfill logic for +2 Billion URLs indexed by Bing
Engineered automated pipeline for discovering new domains for Bing

teamMembers.name: Nish Patel
teamMembers.bio: Nish is specialized in cloud infrastructure and data management systems. With experience at AWS, Genesys, and Hydro One, Nish has worked on large-scale data systems and identity services that serve millions of customers.
achievements: Implemented highly scalable distributed systems for AWS Identity Centre
Worked on multi-region replication and encryption library at AWS
Improved database design and querying efficiency at Hydro One

teamMembers.name: Krishna Solanki
teamMembers.bio: Krishna specializes in machine learning, AI, and full-stack development. With experience at Meta, Amazon, and Wealthsimple, Krishna has delivered recommender systems, ML infrastructure, and high-throughput data pipelines.
achievements: Developed a hyper-personalized recommender system for Amazon, live since 2020
Led 3-week rebuild of Meta's advertising transaction pipeline ($2-3B monthly)
Built ML infrastructure for FinSimpl using AWS

values.title: Technical Excellence
values.description: We hold ourselves to the highest standards of engineering, constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible.

values.title: Pragmatic Innovation
values.description: We balance cutting-edge technology with practical solutions that deliver real business value.

values.title: Client Partnership
values.description: We work closely with our clients, understanding their challenges and goals to deliver tailored solutions.

contactInfo.responseTime: Our team will respond to your inquiry within 24-48 business hours.
contactInfo.cta: Looking for a team of experienced engineers to bring your vision to life? We're ready to help you build innovative AI solutions that drive real business value.

faq.question: What types of projects do you typically work on?
faq.answer: We specialize in AI engineering, full-stack development, and data systems. Our projects range from AI-powered applications and LLM integrations to scalable data pipelines and enterprise systems.

faq.question: How does your project process work?
faq.answer: We follow a structured approach: discovery to understand your needs, planning the solution architecture, implementation with regular reviews, and deployment with ongoing support.

faq.question: Do you work with startups or just enterprise clients?
faq.answer: We work with clients of all sizes, from startups to enterprise organizations. Our solutions are always tailored to meet your specific needs and budget.

faq.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faq.answer: Our team has expertise in a wide range of technologies including AWS, Azure, Python, React, Node.js, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and various database systems. We select the best technologies for each project's specific requirements.
